original_text: The Jewish leaders talked to each other about Jesus' question. ‘We could say that God gave John his authority. But if we say that, Jesus will say to us, “Then you should have believed John.”
korean_text: 그들이 서로 의논하여 이르되 만일 하늘로부터라 하면 어찌하여 그를 믿지 아니하였느냐 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: The Jewish leaders talked to each other
We could say that God gave John his authority
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 요한에게 권위를 주셨다고 말할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: Then you should have believed John
